name: Hierarchical Power Structure Analysis
description: Understanding the mechanisms of hierarchical control and how PSNs embed themselves within power structures.

cards.title: Decoding Power Dynamics
cards.description: Recognizing overt and covert power structures within organizations.
bulletpoints: Formal hierarchies differ from shadow power structures where true control resides.
Narcissistic leaders often manipulate rules to maintain dominance.
Understanding chain-of-command manipulation helps predict PSN tactics.
cards.summaryText: Look past the org chart to find where real decisions happen, see how narcissists twist rules to lock in their dominance, and decode command-chain games to anticipate their next moves.

cards.title: Spotting Manipulative Leadership Strategies
cards.description: How PSNs maintain control over groups using social engineering.
bulletpoints: They install loyal subordinates who act as enforcers and gatekeepers.
They use plausible deniability to shield themselves from accountability.
Cult-like loyalty structures keep subordinates from questioning their authority.
cards.summaryText: Spot the planted loyalists who enforce and gatekeep for them, notice how plausible deniability keeps them clean no matter what goes wrong, and see the cult-like devotion that blocks critical thinking below.

cards.title: Controlled Opposition and Double Agents
cards.description: Identifying infiltrators placed to neutralize threats within resistance movements.
bulletpoints: PSNs plant controlled opposition to monitor and mislead dissidents.
Watch for individuals who discourage action while pretending to support change.
Double agents often shift narratives to favor power retention strategies.
cards.summaryText: Identify the fake rebels planted to spy on and mislead real resistance, flag people who talk a big game but always counsel inaction, and catch narrative pivots that mysteriously favor the status quo.
